org.deeplearning4j.iterativereduce.actor.multilayer

Class ActorNetworkRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.iterativereduce.actor.multilayer.ActorNetworkRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, DeepLearningConfigurable

    public class ActorNetworkRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeepLearningConfigurable, java.io.Serializable
    Controller for coordinating model training for a neural network based on parameters across a cluster for akka.
    See Also:

      • train

        public void train()
        Kicks off the distributed training. It will grab the optimal batch size off of the beginning of the dataset iterator which is based on the desired mini batch size (conf.getSplit()) and the number of initial workers in the state tracker after setup. For example, if you have a mini batch size of 10 and 8 workers the initial @link{DataSetIterator#next(int batches)} would be 80, this would be 10 per worker.

      • getMasterAddress

      • setModelSaver

        public void setModelSaver(ModelSaver modelSaver)
        Sets a custom model saver. This will allow custom directories among other things when saving snapshots.
        Parameters:
        modelSaver - the model saver to use

      • getStateTrackerPort

        public int getStateTrackerPort()
        Gets the state tracker port. A lot of state trackers will be servers that need to be bound on a port. This will allow overrides per implementation of the state tracker
        Returns:
        the state tracker port that the state tracker server will bind to

      • setStateTrackerPort

        public void setStateTrackerPort(int stateTrackerPort)
